name: myHolidaysRadio
0:
”Alexa, play my holidays radio”
”Alexa, start my holidays radio”
”Alexa ask my holidays radio what is playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my holidays radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Your first and last stop in music for the Halloween and Christmas seasons, but that's just the beginning! We have music for some of the minor holidays (Mardi Gras, St. Paddy's, Cinco De Mayo, etc.), and when there aren't any to celebrate, we have a variety of different themes that we play, such as: Star Wars Day, Harry Potter Day, Woodstock, Big Band/Swing, Disco, Summer/Tropical/Reggae, Country, Comedy, Movie Soundtracks, Musicals, and much more. And, we have a request system where you can pick what plays next, and even make dedications. Plus you can join our chat community and enjoy lively conversations with other music enthusiasts.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
